SELECT /* BannerMapper.searchBannerList, 배너목록조회, 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-17 */ JA.TOTAL_COUNT , JA.BNR_MENU_ID , JA.BNR_SEQ , JA.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID , (JA.BNR_MENU_ID || '.' || JA.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID || '.' || JA.BNR_SEQ) AS BANNER_ID , JA.IMG_SIZE_CD , JA.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD , JA.BNR_INFO , JA.EXPO_ORD , JA.EXPO_STATUS_CD , JA.BNR_DESC , JA.IMG_PATH , TO_CHAR(JA.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS REG_DT , (SELECT TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD PR WHERE PR.PROD_ID = JA.BNR_INFO AND ROWNUM = 1) AS TOP_MENU_ID , CASE WHEN (BNR_MENU_ID = 'DP010910' OR BNR_MENU_ID = 'DP010911') THEN /* BEST 앱, BEST 컨텐츠 */ DECODE(BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD , 'DP010303' /* 상품 배너 */ , (SELECT PROD_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD_DESC WHERE LANG_CD = 'ko' AND PROD_ID = JA.BNR_INFO) , 'DP010306' /* 카테고리 배너 */ , (SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC WHERE LANG_CD = 'ko' AND MENU_ID = JA.BNR_INFO) , 'DP010307' /* 운영자 임의추천 배너 */ , (SELECT LIST_NM FROM TB_DP_LIST WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND LIST_ID = JA.BNR_INFO) , 'DP010309' /* 특정 브랜드샵 배너 */ , (SELECT BRAND_SHOP_NM FROM TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND BRAND_SHOP_NO = JA.BNR_INFO) , 'DP010310' /* 내부URL 배너 */ , BNR_NM) WHEN BNR_MENU_ID = 'DP010926' THEN /* 모바일웹 직사각형 */ DECODE(BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD , 'DP010303' /* 상품 배너 */ , (SELECT PROD_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD_DESC WHERE LANG_CD = 'ko' AND PROD_ID = JA.BNR_INFO) , BNR_NM) WHEN BNR_MENU_ID = 'DP010912' THEN /* 앱가이드 */ DECODE(BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD , 'DP010301' /* 외부URL 배너 */ , (SELECT LIST_NM FROM TB_DP_LIST WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND LIST_ID = JA.BNR_INFO) , 'DP010303' /* 상품 배너 */ , (SELECT PROD_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD_DESC WHERE LANG_CD = 'ko' AND PROD_ID = JA.BNR_INFO) , 'DP010312' /* 테마추천 배너 */ , (SELECT LIST_NM FROM TB_DP_LIST WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND LIST_ID = JA.BNR_INFO) , BNR_NM) ELSE BNR_NM END AS BNR_NM , CASE WHEN JA.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD = 'DP010311' THEN /* 상황별 추천리스트 연결 */ (SELECT CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN DECODE(ALWAYS_EXPO_YN, 'Y', SYSDATE, EXPO_START_DT) AND DECODE(ALWAYS_EXPO_YN, 'Y', SYSDATE, EXPO_END_DT) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM TB_DP_RECOM_PKG WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND PKG_ID = JA.BNR_INFO) ELSE 'N' END AS SITU_RECOMM_YN FROM (SELECT IA.TOTAL_COUNT , IA.BNR_MENU_ID , IA.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID , IA.BNR_SEQ , IA.IMG_SIZE_CD , IA.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD , IA.BNR_INFO , IA.BNR_NM , IA.EXPO_ORD , IA.EXPO_ORD_SUB , IA.EXPO_STATUS_CD , IA.BNR_DESC , IA.IMG_PATH , IA.REG_DT FROM (SELECT COUNT(A.BNR_SEQ) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , A.BNR_MENU_ID , A.BNR_SEQ , A.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD , A.BNR_INFO , A.REG_DT , B.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID , B.BNR_NM , B.EXPO_ORD , B.EXPO_ORD_SUB , B.EXPO_STATUS_CD , B.BNR_DESC , C.IMG_SIZE_CD , C.IMG_PATH FROM TB_DP_BNR A , TB_DP_BNR_EXPO B , TB_DP_BNR_IMG C
, TB_DP_BNR_DVC D , TB_CM_DEVICE E
WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.BNR_MENU_ID = B.BNR_MENU_ID AND A.BNR_SEQ = B.BNR_SEQ AND A.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND A.BNR_MENU_ID = C.BNR_MENU_ID AND A.BNR_SEQ = C.BNR_SEQ
AND A.TENANT_ID = D.TENANT_ID AND A.BNR_MENU_ID = D.BNR_MENU_ID AND A.BNR_SEQ = D.BNR_SEQ AND D.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = E.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND D.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND (CASE WHEN (A.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD = 'DP010306' AND SUBSTR(A.BNR_INFO, 1, 4 ) = 'DP13') THEN DECODE(E.EBOOK_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) WHEN (A.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD = 'DP010306' AND SUBSTR(A.BNR_INFO, 1, 4 ) = 'DP14') THEN DECODE(E.COMIC_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) WHEN (A.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD = 'DP010306' AND SUBSTR(A.BNR_INFO, 1, 4 ) = 'DP28') THEN DECODE(E.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0) ELSE 1 END) = 1
AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.EXPO_STATUS_CD IN ('DP010201', 'DP010202') AND C.IMG_SIZE_CD = #{imgSizeCd}
AND C.MOBILE_WEB_EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.BNR_MENU_ID IN ('DP010915', 'DP010916', 'DP010917', 'DP010918', 'DP010919')
AND A.BNR_MENU_ID IN ('DP010912', 'DP010910')
AND ((A.BNR_MENU_ID = 'DP010920' AND B.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID = 'DP011105') OR (A.BNR_MENU_ID = 'DP010921' AND B.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID = 'DP011104'))
AND A.BNR_MENU_ID = #{bnrMenuId}
AND B.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID = #{bnrExpoMenuId}
AND SYSDATE BETWEEN DECODE(B.EXPO_STATUS_CD, 'DP010202', SYSDATE, B.EXPO_START_DT) AND DECODE(B.EXPO_STATUS_CD, 'DP010202', SYSDATE, NVL(B.EXPO_END_DT, SYSDATE)) ) IA
ORDER BY IA.BNR_MENU_ID DESC, IA.EXPO_ORD, IA.EXPO_ORD_SUB, IA.EXPO_STATUS_CD
ORDER BY IA.BNR_MENU_ID, IA.EXPO_ORD, IA.EXPO_ORD_SUB, IA.EXPO_STATUS_CD
) JA

SELECT /* BannerMapper.getRecommendProvisioning, 운영자 임의추천 Provisioning for ebook,comic, 양해엽, 2014-08-21 */ COUNT(LP.PROD_ID) AS PROD_CNT FROM TB_DP_LIST L INNER JOIN TB_DP_LIST_PROD LP ON L.TENANT_ID = LP.TENANT_ID AND L.LIST_ID = LP.LIST_ID INNER JOIN TB_CM_DEVICE CD ON CD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} WHERE 1 = 1 AND L.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND L.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND L.LIST_ID = #{recommendId} AND LP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND LP.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN LP.EXPO_START_DT AND LP.EXPO_END_DT
AND CD.EBOOK_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
AND CD.COMIC_SPRT_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* BannerMapper.searchRecommendProdList, 운영자 임의추천 상품 리스트 조회, 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-17 */ IA.PART_PROD_ID , IB.TOP_MENU_ID FROM (SELECT B.PART_PROD_ID FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID, B.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.LIST_ID = B.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.LIST_ID = #{recommendId} AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT ) A /* 운영자 임의 추천 */ , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B /* 채널-에피소드 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD C /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D /* 채널 상품 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = D.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND D.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' UNION SELECT D.PART_PROD_ID FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID, B.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.LIST_ID = B.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.LIST_ID = #{recommendId} AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT ) A /* 운영자 임의 추천 */ , TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG B /* 쇼핑 카탈로그 */ , TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG C /* 카탈로그-상품 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP D /* 채널-에피소드 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD E /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD F /* 채널 상품 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.CATALOG_ID AND B.CATALOG_ID = C.CATALOG_ID AND C.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND C.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = F.TENANT_ID AND C.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND NVL(B.CHNL_CNT, 0) > 0 AND C.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND F.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND F.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' ) IA , TB_DP_PROD IB WHERE IA.PART_PROD_ID = IB.PROD_ID

SELECT /* BannerMapper.searchBrandShopProdList, 특정 브랜드샵 상품 리스트 조회, 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-17 */ D.PROD_ID AS PART_PROD_ID , D.TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP A , TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP_DVC B , TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP_SELLER C , TB_DP_PROD D WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.BRAND_SHOP_NO = B.BRAND_SHOP_NO AND A.TENANT_ID = C.TENANT_ID AND A.BRAND_SHOP_NO = C.BRAND_SHOP_NO AND C.MBR_NO = D.SELLER_MBR_NO AND B.DVC_TYPE_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.BRAND_SHOP_NO = #{brandShopNo}

SELECT /* BannerMapper.searchThemeRecommProdList, 테마추천 상품 리스트 조회 (앱가이드), 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-17 */ A.LIST_NM , B.PART_PROD_ID , E.TOP_MENU_ID FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID , A.LIST_NM , B.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_LIST A , TB_DP_LIST_PROD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID AND A.LIST_ID = B.LIST_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND A.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND A.LIST_ID = #{themeId} AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT ) A /* 앱가이드 테마 */ , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B /* 채널-에피소드 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD C /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD D /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_PROD E /* 에피소드 상품 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = D.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND D.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND D.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403'

SELECT /* BannerMapper.searchAppGuideProdList, 테마추천 상품 리스트 조회 (앱가이드), 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-03 */ A.PART_PROD_ID , D.TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP A /* 채널-에피소드 매핑 */ , TB_DP_PROD B /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD C /* 채널 상품 */ , TB_DP_PROD D /* 에피소드 상품 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND A.PART_PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND A.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND C.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND C.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND C.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403'

SELECT /* BannerMapper.getBannerProvisioing, 상품 프로비저닝 (에피소드 상품), 이태희/부르칸, 2014-03-17 */ COUNT(A.PROD_ID) AS PROD_CNT FROM TB_DP_PROD A , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD B , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE C , TB_CM_DEVICE D WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND (C.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR C.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND D.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
AND D.EBOOK_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
AND D.COMIC_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
AND (CASE WHEN (NVL(A.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND NVL(D.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN, 'N') = 'N') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) = 1
AND D.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN = 'Y'

SELECT /* Banner.getChannelIdByEpisodeId, BannerMapper.xml, SAC, haeyup.yang 2015-04-13 */ PRSHP.PROD_ID AS CHANNEL_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP PRSHP INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TPROD ON PRSHP.PROD_ID = TPROD.PROD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND PRSHP.PART_PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND PRSHP.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND TPROD.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TPROD.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TPROD.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403'

SELECT /* Banner.getEpisodeIdsByChannelId, BannerMapper.xml, SAC, haeyup.yang 2015-04-13 */ PRSHP.PART_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP PRSHP INNER JOIN TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TPROD ON PRSHP.PROD_ID = TPROD.PROD_ID WHERE 1=1 AND PRSHP.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND PRSHP.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND TPROD.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TPROD.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TPROD.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND ROWNUM < 6

SELECT /* Banner.getBanner, BannerMapper.xml, SAC, haeyup.yang 2015-04-13 */ B.BNR_MENU_ID, B.BNR_SEQ, B.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD, B.BNR_INFO, TO_CHAR(B.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS REG_DT, (B.BNR_MENU_ID || '.' || BE.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID || '.' || B.BNR_SEQ) AS BANNER_ID, BE.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID, BE.BNR_DESC, BI.IMG_SIZE_CD, BI.IMG_PATH, CASE WHEN B.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD = 'DP010303' /* product banner */ THEN (SELECT TOP_MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD PR WHERE PR.PROD_ID = B.BNR_INFO) ELSE null END AS TOP_MENU_ID, CASE WHEN B.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD = 'DP010303' /* product banner */ THEN (SELECT PROD_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD_DESC WHERE LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND PROD_ID = B.BNR_INFO) ELSE BE.BNR_NM END AS BNR_NM FROM TB_DP_BNR B INNER JOIN TB_DP_BNR_EXPO BE ON B.TENANT_ID = BE.TENANT_ID AND B.BNR_MENU_ID = BE.BNR_MENU_ID AND B.BNR_SEQ = BE.BNR_SEQ INNER JOIN TB_DP_BNR_IMG BI ON B.TENANT_ID = BI.TENANT_ID AND B.BNR_MENU_ID = BI.BNR_MENU_ID AND B.BNR_SEQ = BI.BNR_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND B.BNR_MENU_ID = #{bnrMenuId} AND B.BNR_SEQ = #{bnrSeq} AND BE.BNR_EXPO_MENU_ID = #{bnrExpoMenuId} AND BE.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND BI.IMG_SIZE_CD = #{imgSizeCd} AND SYSDATE BETWEEN DECODE(BE.EXPO_STATUS_CD, 'DP010202', SYSDATE, BE.EXPO_START_DT) AND DECODE(BE.EXPO_STATUS_CD, 'DP010202', SYSDATE, NVL(BE.EXPO_END_DT, SYSDATE))

SELECT /* Banner.getProdProvisioning, BannerMapper.xml, SAC, haeyup.yang 2015-04-13 */ COUNT(A.PROD_ID) AS PROD_CNT FROM TB_DP_PROD A , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD B , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE C , TB_CM_DEVICE D WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND B.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND B.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND B.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND (C.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR C.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND D.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND A.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
AND D.EBOOK_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
AND D.COMIC_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
AND (CASE WHEN (NVL(A.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND NVL(D.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN, 'N') = 'N') THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) = 1
AND D.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
